Articles.Content:
Didn't know where else to put this.. If wrong just move it.

I'm just getting into repainting textures and I wanted a logo to slap on things to give what I'm painting some life.. So I figured "KASA" and also figured everyone else probably already did this 1000 times.. But I only found two and they were very small and didn't have enough of the "Kerbal" spin to it.

So I made my own from scratch. Free for all to use.. Just give credit if used.

Link to transparent PNG in case the image host kills the picture below: http://www./download/efkf90i0zxyxhw0/KASA.png

Looks interesting, and I quite like the homage to the NASA "meatball" logo.

However, I feel that the addition of the crashing rocket makes the design a bit too busy / distracting, and the full-color explosion at the end of the flight path is a definite no-no in logo design - logos should generally use as few solid colors as possible (avoid gradients / photorealistic effects).
I kindly disagree about it being too busy. All personal opinions of course. But do agree with your full color explosion part. I did correct that.. Thanks kindly for the feedback.
